metadata.title: CVE-2021-27906 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A carefully crafted PDF file can trigger an OutOfMemory-Exception whileloading the file. This issue affects Apache PDFBox version 2.0.22 and prior2.0.x versions.

criterions.comment: libpdfbox-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
